channel.title: Cointelegraph.com News
channel.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

image.title: Cointelegraph.com News
image.description: Cointelegraph covers fintech, blockchain and Bitcoin bringing you the latest crypto news and analyses on the future of money.

item.title: Namibia signs crypto exchange regulation bill into law
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.category: Hage Geingob Virtual Asset Service Provider
item.description: The law will officially enter into force at a date determined by Namibia’s Ministry of Finance.

item.title: Deloitte, Chainalysis alliance to give law enforcement a crypto edge
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Felix Ng
item.description: Big Four accounting firm Deloitte said the partnership could help authorities identify and take down bad actors hiding "behind the keyboard."

item.title: KuCoin denies mass layoffs, says cuts are part of 'normal' operations
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Brayden Lindrea
item.description: KuCoin has shut down rumors that it would be laying off 30% of its workforce but admitted there may be some "personnel adjustments" in the future.

item.title: USD-backed stablecoin pilot project launched by Pacific island nation of Palau
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Derek Andersen
item.description: The Palau Stablecoin, or “Kluk,” will be minted on XRP Ledger using the Ripple CBDC Platform and will be distributed first to government employees.

item.title: Trademark attorney predicts legal fights ahead with Twitter’s rebrand to X
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: According to Josh Gerben, the social media platform could be embroiled in lawsuits over its “X” branding for years, costing upward of millions of dollars.

item.title: Researcher envisions smart education system built with blockchain, DAOs, NFTs and AI
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: According to the research, combining the technologies will result in 12 distinct advantages over the traditional educational system.

item.title: OpenAI creator launches Worldcoin
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: On this week’s episode of “The Market Report," Cointelegraph’s resident expert discusses the launch of the Worldcoin token by OpenAI creator Sam Altman and why it's controversial.

item.title: Bitcoin price is down, but data signals that $30K and above is the path of least resistance
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Even with a price correction to $29,000, several Bitcoin price metrics show traders casting bets on a quick rebound.

item.title: Here’s what happened in crypto today
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Serge Egon Ostman
item.category: why did the Fed pause rates
item.description: Need to know what happened in crypto today? Here is the latest news on daily trends and events impacting the Bitcoin price, blockchain, DeFi, NFTs, Web3 and crypto regulation.

item.title: Zero-knowledge tech development heats up amid bear market
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: The intersection of ZK proofs and multichain bridges has become one of the industry's more intriguing development.

item.title: Judge gives US prosecutors until Oct. 3 for discovery in case against Alex Mashinsky
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: U.S. District Judge John Koeltl granted a continuance for former Celsius CEO Alex Mashinsky’s trial start date, citing the “volume of discovery” and the “complexity of the case.”

item.title: Ether death cross threatens more downside as ETH price trades at a key support level
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Nivesh Rustgi
item.description: ETH’s technical and on-chain indicators point toward further downside, but there is a silver lining.

item.title: Alphapo payment provider hack now estimated at over $60M — ZachXBT
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The on-chain sleuth ZachXBT claims to have found an additional $37 million in losses suffered from the unconfirmed attack.

item.title: Avalanche Foundation allocates $50M investment to on-chain asset token purchases
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tristan Greene
item.description: Called "Avalanche Vista," the initiative will consider investing in any asset that can be tokenized.

item.title: Era Lend on zkSync exploited for $3.4M in reentrancy attack
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Tom Blackstone
item.description: The lending app was drained of funds using a “read-only reentrancy” bug, a type of vulnerability that is often difficult for auditors to spot.

item.title: Abu Dhabi regulator grants trading firm Rain permission to offer crypto services
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Turner Wright
item.description: The announcement followed crypto exchange Binance receiving similar permission from the Abu Dhabi regulator in November 2022.

item.title: Solana game developer Automata announces mass layoffs
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Zhiyuan Sun
item.description: “It is with a heavy heart that I am writing today to share news about team restructuring efforts we are effectuating today," wrote CEO and co-founder Michael Wagner.

item.title: 8 ways crypto companies can improve their financial compliance in the US
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Cointelegraph Innovation Circle
item.description: Absent clear, comprehensive regulatory guidance in the U.S., crypto companies would be wise to shore up their accounting systems.

item.title: Compiler vs. interpreter: Key differences
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Alice Ivey
item.description: Learn about the crucial differences between compilers and interpreters and how they affect code execution and development.

item.title: AI and dot-com bubble share some similarities but differ where it counts
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Stephen Katte
item.description: AI has seen massive growth in recent years, leading to comparisons with the now infamous dot-com bubble and crash of the 1990s.

item.title: Crypto-friendly Robinhood inches closer to UK with local CEO appointment
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Helen Partz
item.description: Robinhood has been planning its expansion into the United Kingdom since 2019, but the project has faced multiple delays.

item.title: Elon Musk says X will offer an ‘entire financial world’ in the coming months
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: In light of Twitter’s rebranding, Elon Musk says users can expect to conduct their “entire financial world” via the X platform in the coming months.

item.title: Sotheby’s blockchain Gen Art program shows tech taking a back seat to art
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Vittoria Benzine
item.description: Sotheby’s new generative art program will record all of its sales exclusively on the Ethereum blockchain.

item.title: Debt is GOOD for Bitcoin?? Shocking insights revealed
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Marcel Pechman
item.description: Cointelegraph analyst and writer Marcel Pechman explains why debt might be good for Bitcoin, and discusses JPMorgan’s method for trading debt instruments.

item.title: Axie Infinity creator to develop new game in partnership with CyberKongz
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Ezra Reguerra
item.description: Sky Mavis executive Kathleen Osgood said that the catalyst for the revival of blockchain gaming would be an experience that understands the motivations driving users into Web3.

item.title: Bitget surpasses 20M users as wallet integration spurs trading volumes
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Gareth Jenkinson
item.description: The platform is now among the four largest cryptocurrency exchanges by trading volume after integrating with its recently acquired wallet service BitKeep.

item.title: Why is Dogecoin price up today?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Yashu Gola
item.category: Why is Dogecoin price up today
item.description: Dogecoin price hits a two-month high amid speculations that Twitter’s rebrand to X would add a DOGE payment option.

item.title: Former CFTC chairman says stablecoins can be a bridge between two worlds
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Savannah Fortis
item.description: Timothy Massad, the former CFTC chairman, highlighted the benefits of stablecoins and urged regulators not to discredit their utility.

item.title: Worldcoin may face UK data regulators inquiry days after launch: Report
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By Prashant Jha
item.description: The project has faced criticism from within the fintech world over its dystopian features and privacy concerns.

item.title: How low can the Bitcoin price go?
item.dc:creator: Cointelegraph By William Suberg
item.description: Bitcoin is down to one-month lows, and BTC price predictions are tending to assume worse is to come — how much lower can bears manage?
